title: Zan a lo thleng dawn thawk ru
lyrics:
Zan a lo thleng dawn thawk r'u,
Zing thawh hlim atangin;
Dai a la awmin thawk r'u,
Vawt mah selangin.
Ni san deuh pawhin thawk r'u,
A thawh nawm lai takin;
Zan a lo thleng dawn thawk r'u,
Chawl duh rih lovin.

Zan a lo thleng dawn, thawk r'u,
Ni sa pawisa lovin;
Chhun lai takah pawh thawk r'u,
Thlansa chung pawhin.
Nileng pawhin thawk zel r'u,
Ban hun thlen hma loh chuan;
Zan a lo thleng dawn thawk r'u,
chawl duh rih lovin.

Zan a lo thleng dawn, thawk r'u,
Ni a nem hun pawhin;
Tla dawn mah sela, thawk r'u,
Thim lek lek pawhin.
A hmuh theih chhungin thawk r'u,
Zan lo thlen hma loh chu;
Zan a lo thlen hun chunain,
Kan thawk thei tawh lo'ng.
